TopicTitle: MKS parts showing up in R&D but not the VAB/SPH

Articles.Content: So I recently unlocked the MKS Habitation rings and Konstruction docking ports, among other USI parts, but they are nowhere to be found in the VAB/SPH. Has anyone else had this issue?

If you haven't figured it out by now, the latest version of MKS comes bundled with a version of USITools in which the custom categories MKS uses to show its parts are broken. Replace it with this version to get them to show.
